name: Absolver
effect:
Weapon
Paladins have +3 Levels for equipping Absolver.
This character's melee strikes inflict an additional wound against characters of the opposite alignment.

name: Actelli
effect:
Mercenary • Scout • STEALTH +0
Spend Order: If Actelli is in the first rank: Look at the top 5 cards of any deck. Discard one, and return the rest in any order.
"The Horsemen got too involved. Dorath knows better."

name: Amoudasi's Blaze
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
After Amoudasi's Blaze attacks: Kill Amoudasi's Blaze and search your deck for a card named Amoudasi's Inferno, and put it into play spent in this rank.
"...But he's gone now..."

name: Amoudasi's Candle
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
After a melee strike that missed Amoudasi's Candle: Kill Amoudasi's Candle and search your deck for a card named Amoudasi's Blaze and put it into play spent in this rank.
"It's my cousin you want, he knew all about fire..."

name: Amoudasi's Inferno
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
React: After a melee strike or action targets Amoudasi's Inferno: Perform a +5 melee strike targeting that character.
"...wait, you want me?" - Zagreb Umbala

name: Anointed by the Storm
effect: Order: Target character has +1 HP until end of turn. On your next Order, skip that Order and give the target a bnous to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to this cleric's Level until end of turn.
"Humility comes not before honor. They are one and the same." - Brother Vallerand

name: Arden Tide
effect:
Free Kingdoms Warlord
React: After target character rolls a magic save that failed by 10 or more, or was a Critical Failure: Inflict a wound on the target.
"Madness is all that remains, 'Master'."

name: Aron
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Order: Once per turn: Target Free Kingdoms character's next melee strike this turn ignores the Astral and Ethereal traits.
"I've been studying the elven ghosts. Just in case."

name: Ashling
effect:
Elf • Undead / Crypt Gaunt
After you roll initiative: If Ashling is in the discard pile, you may remove a card in any discard pile from the game.
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
Order: Kill Ashling: Perform a +3 ranged strike.

name: Astral Blast
effect:
Illusionists have +1 Level for performing this action.
React: After an opposing character rolls a save or check that failed by 10 or more or was a Critical Failure, target a number of characters in your army up to the caster's Level: Each target gains the Astral trait and DEFEND +10 until end of next turn.

name: Averisk Glyn
effect:
Elf Warlord • SCRIBE +7
Averisk Glyn is a rogue and wizard.
React: After Averisk Glyn performs a scribed action: Perform a +4 ranged strike against a target of that action.
Averisk's ranged strikes may target characters in an adjacent rank.

name: Backswing
effect: React: After this character performs a melee strike: This character has -3 ATK until end of turn. Perform a melee strike.
"You want to die faster puny elf? We'll go faster." - Brikta

name: Bag of Treasures
effect:
For each Charge on Bag of Treasures, this character has +1 ATK, +1 AC, +1 Skill, and +1 Level for defeating dungeons.
React: After you defeat a dungeon: Put a Charge on Bag of Treasures and draw a card.
"Treasure unknown. Take your pick, but work for me for a year." - Traveler

name: Battle
effect:
Dwarf
Spend Order: Discard a Dwarf character from your hand: Remove a wound from target Dwarf.
"Don't worry about the others. You'll be fine, and that's all that matters."

name: Belan
effect:
Mercenary • Scout
React: Once per turn, after a character within one rank targets a ranged strike: Add Belan's Skill to the ranged strike roll.
"Being a great sniper requires a little accuracy but it's mostly not falling asleep while you wait."

name: Blighted Tokens
effect: Order: Spend Blighted Tokens: Target non-Ethereal character you control has -10 AC and the Astral trait until end of turn. If this character is a Cantor, he may target characters you don't control with this ability.
"A gift from my Grandfather, along with this piece of advice: Never get into a situation where you'll need them." - Samuel

name: Brass Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle
After Brass Gargoyle enters play: Inflict a wound on it.
Order: Once per turn, spend one of your clerics: Remove a wound from Brass Gargoyle.
"You didn't have any iron?" - Focus

name: Brother Vallerand
effect:
Deverenian • Cantor
React: Once per turn, after Brother Vallerand performs an action that gave a Deverenian a bonus to ATK, AC, Skill, or HP: Give the same bonuses to another Deverenian of equal or higher Level than the first, with the same duration.

name: Chaotic Flames
effect: Order: Spend any number of wizards in your army: Opposing characters have -2 Skill until end of turn for each wizard spent.
"It's amazing what you can learn to do in just a few centuries." - Rockhome

name: Clearing the Mark
effect: Spend Order: Target an item in play up to twice this rogue's Level. On your next Order, skip that Order and instead remove that item from the game.
"I see you have drunk quite well. Let me get the 'tab' for you."

name: Coblyn
effect:
Elf • SCRIBE +9
Coblyn may scribe rogue actions.
React: Once per turn, after Coblyn performs a scribed action: Return a Level 5 or lower item from your discard pile from hand.
Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.

name: Colichemarde
effect:
Weapon
Order: Once per turn: Attach a fighter action card to Colichemarde from your hand.
React: After a character targets a melee strike, spend a Level X fighter action card attached to Colichemarde: Gain +X ATK until end of turn, or equip Colichemarde to target character you control with Level X.

name: Combat Casting
effect: React: After this character casts a spell that inflicted a wound on an opposing character: Return a Level 3 or lower spell from your discard pile to your hand.
"I've had long to prepare what I'm going to do to you 'Master' K'Hallaek," mused Arden Tide.

name: Dallen Stormlost
effect:
Deverenian Warlord • Seer • MAGIC RESISTANCE +7
Dallen is both a cleric and a fighter.
Order: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand: Remove one wound from Dallen.
Order: Once per turn: Choose an opposing player who must shuffle his hand into his deck and draw 4 cards.

name: Dawes
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Spend Order: Target an opposing non-Warlord Level 1 character within one rank: At end of turn, if Dawes is still in play, kill the target.
"You have a point, Spence. Maybe we should give these elves a few corpses of their own to play with..."

name: Deceitful Aid
effect: Spend Order: Target a character. On your next Order, skip that Order and ready the target.
"Here any ally can seem an enemy. Which are you, truely?" - Samuel

name: Defy the Chains
effect:
Characters may perform this action while stunned.
React: After an opposing character performs an action that spent, stunned, or moved this character, suffer one wound: Ready this fighter. If this character is a Barbarian, he has +3 ATK until end of turn.

name: Devious Gauntlets
effect:
Gauntlet
Order: Once per turn: Attach a rogue action card to Devious Gauntlets from your hand.
Order: Spend a Level X rogue action card attached to Devious Gauntlets: Gain RIPOSTE +X until the end of turn, or target spent character within one rank has -X AC until end of turn.

name: Devious Illusions
effect:
Rogue or wizard only.
React: After this character is targeted by a melee strike, succeed with a dexterity check (DC 16): If successful and this character is a rogue, the strike is a Critical Failure. If successful and this character is a wizard, inflict a wound on the attacker.

name: Disintegrate
effect: Order: Target an unwounded character up to 2 ranks away: Succeed with a Skill check (DC = the target's AC) to inflict one wound on the target or destroy an item equipped by the target.
"All things turn to dust." - Keira Syneri

name: Dorath Sa'dul
effect:
Mercenary Warlord • Illusionist
Dorath Sa'dul is a cleric and a wizard.
Order: Once per turn: return target non-Warlord character to its owner's hand. This ability may not target opposing characters with items equipped.
"How can we help you?"

name: Eamon Geist
effect:
Dwarf • Astral • MEDICINE +5
While Eamon is in your hand, your Dwarves have the ability "Spend React: After this character pays the costs of an action, reveal Eamon from your hand and discard a card: Whenever that action would unstun or remove a wound from a Dwarf, instead ready that Dwarf."

name: Eleora
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Druid
Order: Once per turn, reveal an Astral character from your hand: Free Kingdoms characters have +2 ATK and +2 AC while in your army until end of turn.
"Sometimes-most times-secrets are secret for a very good reason."

name: Endure
effect:
Dwarf
React: Once per turn, after an action which readied an adjacent Dwarf: Ready Endure.
"Etor, call a truce now, before we are overwhelmed. We cannot win, but there are alternatives to fighting."

name: Enigmist
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Ethereal / Fog
May not equip items.
React: Once per turn, after another Monster in your army suffers wounds: Move forward one rank.
"Choose wisely, one gift is your wildest dream, the other is your wildest dream turned inside out."

name: Facing the Demons
effect: Order: Perform a +0 melee strike. On your next Order, skip that Order and instead this character performs a +0 melee strike.
"We achieved what the ancients could not when we sealed the Abyss. What could they possibly have to offer us?" - Vex Dutan

name: Fernon Wynard
effect:
Free Kingdoms
React: Once per turn, after a higher Level character targets Fernon Wynard with a melee or ranged strike: Fernon Wynard gains the Astral trait until end of turn.
"Maybe you do have some use after all."

name: Ferris Bachman
effect:
Free Kingdoms Warlord • Bard
You may have other copies of this Warlord in your deck.
Ferris Bachman enters play in rank 3 with the Warlord trait.
Order: Once per game: Target character must target this character with melee or ranged strikes whenever possible. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)

name: Fevered Shade
effect:
Elf • Undead
After Fevered Shade is put into the discard pile from anywhere: You may remove a card in your discard pile from the game. If you do, target character has -2 AC and -2 Skill until end of turn.

name: Final Blessing
effect:
React: After a character targets one or more cards in a discard pile with an action: Cancel the action and the acting character suffers a wound.
React: After target character suffers wounds: The target has +1 HP until end of turn.

name: Fiore
effect:
Elf • Epic • Hero • SCRIBE +6
Fiore may SCRIBE fighter actions and is +1 Level for performing action cards.
React: Once per game, after Fiore performs a scribed action: She permanently gains +10 Skill, +2 HP, and the Ethereal trait. Put up to 4 Levels of Undead Elves from your discard pile into play.

name: Fo'ttr'ak'ka
effect:
Nothrog Warlord
Your Nothrog's melee strikes may target an additional rank away while they have one or more wounds on them.
React: Once per turn, after target Nothrog suffers wounds: The target has +1 HP until end of turn.

name: Focused Shot
effect: Order: Target a character two ranks away (Two or three ranks away, if this character is a Scout): On your next Order, skip that Order and instead perform a +5 ranged strike against the target.
"I don't know about you, but where I come from, we wait until our men are out of the firing line before we shoot." - Trevor Magson

name: Gacheru
effect:
Familiar
Gacheru may remain spent.
Spend Order: Spend Gacheru: Target a character in play. Until Gacheru readies or leaves play, this character's melee strikes and actions may target that character as if he were one rank closer.

name: Geraint the Grin
effect:
Free Kingdoms • RIPOSTE +4
React: Once per turn, after Geraint targets a melee strike: You may remove from the game an item of Level 6 or lower equipped to the target of the strike. If you do, Geraint gains +2 ATK permanently.
"Need a sword paladin? I got one dead cheap!"

name: Ghed Bodmin
effect:
Deverenian • Stormwraith • Astral • DEFEND +7
While Ghed Bodmin is in your hand, your Deverenian Illusionists have the ability "Spend React: After a Deverenian in your army is targeted by a melee or ranged strike, reveal Ghed Bodmin from your hand and discard a card: Redirect the strike to a different character in the same rank."

name: Ghed Brehm
effect:
Deverenian • Stormwraith • Astral
Order: Once per turn: Target character within one rank must succeed with a fear save (DC 9) or become spent. Spent characters instead become stunned.
"Learn by the examples of thy betters."

name: Ghed Trussen
effect:
Deverenian • Stormwraith • Astral
React: After an opposing character targets Ghed Trussen with a melee strike: The opposing character must succeed with a fear save (DC 12) or the strike is a Critical Failure and Ghed Trussen gains +4 ATK until end of turn.

name: Ghed Vengir
effect:
Deverenian • Stormwraith • Astral • DEFEND +7
Order: Once per turn: Move forward one rank.
React: Once per turn, after an opposing character kills another Deverenian in this rank: All opposing ready characters must succeed with a fear save (DC 15) or become spent.
"Open the temple, breach the Plane."

name: Glimmering Mail
effect:
Armor
Order: Once per turn: Attach a cleric action card to Glimmering Mail from your hand.
Order: Spend a Level X cleric action card attached to Glimmering Mail: Gain MEDICINE +X until the end of turn, or unstun target character with Level X.

name: Grace Hearthpride
effect:
Dwarf Warlord / Order of Svanna
Grace Hearthpride is a cleric and a rogue.
Your Dwarf clerics have the ability "Spend React: Before a Dwarf suffers wounds, discard a cleric or rogue action card from your hand: Reduce the wounds by one, or unstun a Dwarf."

name: Grasp of Vengeance
effect:
Druids have +1 Level for performing this action.
Spend Order: Target a number of characters within one rank up to this cleric's Level: Each must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or move backward one rank. If they fail by 10 or more, or have a Critical Failure, they move backward two ranks instead.

name: Grave Robbing
effect: Spend Order: Target a lower Level character in your discard pile: On your next Order, skip that Order and instead put the target into play in your front rank with 1 HP and the Undead trait. If this character is not a Necromancer, kill the target at end of turn.
"My voice... my power has been restored to me."

name: Grigori the Spineless
effect:
Deverenian • Illusionist • SCRIBE +7
Grigori the Spineless may SCRIBE any number of times per turn.
React: Once per turn, after one of your Deverenians is targeted by an action that doesn't produce melee strikes, remove a spell scribed to Grigori from the game: Cancel the action.

name: Grit
effect:
Dwarf
Order: Once per turn: Ready Grit.
"Groundswell's a'right, I suppose. High walls, no enemies, and the bare sky above your head. It's just... not home."

name: Hall of Legends
effect:
Challenge Rating 5
Warlords and Heroes have +3 ATK, +3 AC, and +3 Skill.
"You shall know many trials before your task is at an end." - The Eternal Emperor

name: Heath Stafford
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Bard
React: Once per turn, after a character pays the costs for an action: Target Free Kingdoms has +5 Skill for the duration of the action.
"We had a bunch of adventures trying to find somebody to replace Jeffrey."

name: Howling Guard
effect:
Shield
Order: Once per turn: Attach a wizard action card to Howling Guard from your hand.
Order: Spend a Level X wizard action card attached to Howling Guard: Perform a +X ranged strike, or gain +X Skill until end of turn.

name: Huldra
effect:
Nothrog • Illusionist
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike, then spend any characters adjacent to Huldra.
"There is something unnatural about Fo'ttr'ak'ka. Can we trust these new soldiers?"

name: Hunting for Sport
effect: Order: Target a spent character within one rank: For each of your next three Orders, skip that Order and perform a melee strike against the target.
"Elf may not kill Elf, but those at the meetings do worse, bickering while our enemies gather. Damn that council." - Cairbre Netheryn

name: Inspiring Strike
effect:
Paladins have +1 Level for performing this action.
React: After this character performs a melee strike that hit by 10 or more or was a Critical Success: Until end of turn, your characters in your first rank have a bonus to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to this character's Level.

name: Isa the Tabernacle
effect:
Mercenary
Isa the Tabernacle may not target ready characters with ranged strikes.
Order: Discard a card: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
"I apprenticed with Zartoch and worked for Kerebrus. As you can see, I found Dorath more to my liking."

name: Jautya Syne
effect:
Mercenary Warlord • Astral
After starting armies are revealed: Put a lower Level non-multiclass character from your deck into play ready in rank 3. It permanently gains the Warlord trait, +1 HP, and the ability "Order: Reveal Jautya Syne from your hand and shuffle him into your deck: Ready this character." Shuffle Jautya Syne into your deck.

name: Justice
effect:
Dwarf • Unique • DEFEND +3 • MEDICINE +5 / Order of Svanna
React: Once per target per turn, after target opposing character kills one of your characters: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or stun.
"This will not be another Ironhall." - The Broken Earth

name: Kaballite Defiance
effect: Spend Order: Spend any number of wizards in your army: Perform a +8 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound, and then perform a +3 ranged strike for each other wizard spent.
"Krun, we cannot stop the inevitable. The plane will open." - Talyn

name: Kieran
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Lycanthrope • Astral
While Kieran is in your hand, your Druids have the ability "Spend Order: Reveal Kieran from your hand and discard him or two other cards: Search your deck for a Lycanthrope and put it into your hand."

name: Kinnag
effect:
Nothrog
Adjacent Nothrog have +3 ATK for each wound on Kinnag.
"The totem lodge was devastated, the spirits slain alongside their shamans. Those responsible shall pay in blood."

name: Kulhen
effect:
Nothrog
While Kulhen has a Weapon equipped, his melee strikes may target an additional rank away.
"I'm afraid I'm not very skilled at witty banter, but please allow me to respond."

name: Laela
effect:
Deverenian • Bard • CHARISMA +4 / Isadran
React: Once per turn, after a melee strike targets one of your Deverenians: The ATK for the strike is changed to +0.
"Talib searches for answers even the saladins dare not seek."

name: Lifedrainer
effect:
Weapon
React: After this character targets a melee strike, remove 3 characters in a discard pile from the game: The strike inflicts an additional wound.
"Loot from adventurers from far beyond our lands. This land is ruled by kingdoms of peaceful dragons. I am not, however, one of those." - Shadowblaze

name: Maes
effect:
Elf • SCRIBE +6 / Kabal
Maes may scribe spells from the discard pile as though they were in your hand.
After Maes casts a scribed spell, remove that spell from the game.
"I could make you a skeleton instead, if you prefer."

name: Malrog's Lair
effect:
Challenge Rating 10 • 3 Charges
Malrog's Lair has +5 Challenge Rating for each Charge on it.
When you would defeat Malrog's Lair, you may instead remove a Charge. If this removes the last Charge, you win the game.
Dragons and Monsters may not be spent to defeat Malrog's Lair.

name: Mammoth's Tusks
effect:
Nothrog • Siege
Mammoth's Tusks' melee strikes ignore AC bonuses from items.
React: Once per turn, after Mammoth's Tusks performs an Order on an action card: You may perform an additional Order after the current one.

name: Master's Trinkets
effect:
Helm • 3 Charges
This character has +2 AC against ranged strikes for each Charge on Master's Trinkets.
Order: Spend Master's Trinkets and remove a Charge: Perform a +7 ranged strike.

name: Militia
effect:
Dwarf / Order of Svanna
Militia may equip fighter items.
Order: Once per turn: Put a Charge on target character.
Order: Once per turn: Unstun target character.
"Forever shall the Order guard Groundswell."

name: Mina the Disturbing
effect:
Deverenian
React: Once per turn, after Mina casts a spell: Reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is a spell, put that card in your hand and you may perform another Order after the current one.
"Away fear. Away pain. Away all."

name: Mizgo
effect:
Familiar
Order: Destroy Mizgo: Perform a +4 ranged strike. If the strike misses, you may put Mizgo on the top of your deck.
"My what... pointy... sharp... teeth..." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Mozbach the Devious
effect:
Deverenian
Order: Once per turn: Target character within two ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 7 + Mozbach's Skill) or suffer a wound.
"My lord Dallen, I am loyal to you alone."

name: Natalja Wynard
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Paladin • Astral
React: After Natalja Wynard kills a character: Choose an opponent who must reveal their hand.
"The chance of losing one's destiny should not be one of those reasons, Elora!"

name: Nature's Corrosion
effect:
Druids have +3 Levels for performing this action.
Order: Target a lower Level character within three ranks. On your next Order, skip that Order and destroy an item equipped to the target.
"Even the plants here have their secrets." - Eleora

name: Nexus of Secrets
effect:
Challenge Rating 7
All players play with their hands revealed and have +1 hand size.
"Stay a while. Stay forever..." - Jautya Syne

name: Nilrem
effect:
Dwarf • Seer • Gargoyle
Your other Gargoyles have +2 ATK, +2 AC, and +2 Skill.
"Once more, gargoyles and dwarves stand together. But this time, we shall follow your lead." - Sigrida Valora

name: Nora Tristram
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Unique • Paladin • CHARISMA +3
React: After Nora Tristram performs a melee strike that killed the target: Until end of turn your Free Kingdoms have +3 ATK and +3 AC while in your army.
"We'll bind the wound. This one obviously didn't come from the keep."

name: Off the Beaten Path
effect: Spend Order: If there is exactly one dungeon in play, search your deck for a dungeon with a lower Challenge Rating and put it into play. The original dungeon is considered blank while the new dungeon is in play.
"Well, if it's on our route anyway..." - Farrel Wadreth

name: Ophinuchus
effect:
Elf Warlord • Ranger • MEDICINE +4
Wounds inflicted by Ophinuchus may not be reduced.
React: After a wound is removed from Ophinuchus, discard a card: Inflict a wound on a character within one rank.
"Undying. Unforgiving."

name: Orne
effect:
Elf • Scout • Astral • STEALTH +8 • MARKSMANSHIP +8
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike.
While Orne is in your hand, your Elf rogues have the ability "Order: Reveal Orne from your hand and discard a card: Gain MARKSMANSHIP +8 and STEALTH +8 until end of turn."

name: Overwhelm
effect: Order: Spend any number of fighters in your army: Perform an Order for each fighter spent, and then an Order for each Ranger spent.
"Deverenia is threat enough that you make peace with the elves. You must accept the Children of Yscar also, Dukat." - Jin Valford

name: Passing the Knives
effect: Spend Order: If this character is in your first rank, spend X rogues in your army: Target a character in play, up to X ranks away. Perform a melee strike against the target, then perform X +0 melee strikes against the target. These strikes may not receive any bonuses to ATK, and ignore all bonuses to the target's AC.

name: Persecute
effect: React: After this character is targeted by a melee or ranged strike, spend any number of rogues in your army: This character has +2 AC until end of turn for each rogue spent. The attacking character has -2 AC until end of turn for each rogue spent.

name: Power of the Ancients
effect: React: After this character performs an action that readied a character: That character may perform an additional Order after the current one.
"My foes have a foothold here. I need one too, Abraxas." - Ter-Soth

name: Powerful Swing
effect: Order: On your next Order, skip that Order and perform a melee strike. After that strike, if the strike hit and this character is a Barbarian, destroy an item equipped to the target of the strike.
"Leave some alive. They must tell the tale." - Rathra Dak

name: Preen
effect:
Dwarf
React: Once per turn, after a melee strike that targeted a Dwarf: The attacking character must succeed with a magic save (DC 13) or suffer one wound.
"Dwarven women? All bearded ain't they?" - Josef Krieg

name: Rancor
effect:
Dwarf
React: Before Rancor dies: Perform a melee strike.
"A name that spreads true fear amongst all of our enemies." - Balance

name: Rangok
effect:
Nothrog
Spend Order: Move an adjacent spent character forward one rank.
"What... what has happened here?"

name: Rathra Dak
effect:
Nothrog Warlord
Rathra Dak is a fighter and rogue and her melee strikes inflict an additional wound against spent characters.
React: After Rathra Dak performs a melee or ranged strike that killed the target: Look at the top 5 cards of any deck. Remove one of them from the game. Return the rest in any order.

name: Raze
effect: Spend Order: For each of your next three Orders, skip that Order and instead perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to this wizard's Skill. These strikes may target an additional rank away if you have more cards in your hand than each opponent.

name: Reches' Labyrinth
effect:
Challenge Rating 2
Reches' Labyrinth has +2 Challenge Rating for each Charge on it.
After it is defeated, each player discards their hand and draws 5 cards.
Each Warlord has the ability "React: After another player spends characters to defeat Reches' Labyrinth, spend X characters in your army: Put X Charges on Reches' Labyrinth.

name: Reckless Abandon
effect: Spend Order: Spend X fighters in your army: Until end of turn, this fighter gains +X HP and the ability "Order: Suffer a wound: Perform a melee strike." Until end of turn, this character's wounds may not be removed or reduced by action cards.

name: Revitalize
effect: Order: Spend any number of clerics in your army: Put a character from your discard pile on top of your deck for each cleric spent.
"These are not the Nothrog you used to know, Deverenian." - Natalja Wynard

name: Rhelok
effect:
Nothrog • Barbarian
Order: Discard a fighter action card: Perform a melee strike with base ATK equal to the Level of the discarded card. If the discarded card has Barbarian printed in its textbox, the strike inflicts an additional wound.
"I wish they'd lend me more than just their voices."

name: Riad Blight
effect:
Mercenary • Druid
Spend Order: Monsters have a bonus to ATK equal to Riad Blight's Level while they are in your army until end of turn.
"Upstarts. That's all they are." - Brett Lund

name: Richard Key
effect:
Mercenary
Order: Discard a card: Richard Key has +1 Level for defeating dungeons until end of turn.
React: Once per turn, after you defeat a dungeon: Draw two cards.
"Hired hand? Never. I'm an independent man, my failures are my own and my successes are my family's. I do not need your treasure."

name: Rockhome
effect:
Dwarf Warlord
Order: Spend an equipped item: Put a Charge on Rockhome.
Order: Remove 4 Charges: The next spell Rockhome casts this turn does not require spending as a cost.
"Hember's Rune makes no mention of a 'brother'." - Chant

name: Roman Aedroud
effect:
Deverenian • Paladin
Adjacent higher Level Deverenians have +2 ATK and +2 AC.
"The Storm doth not kill me, Novice. Indeed it makes me stronger, to fight for thy Empire."

name: Rush to Battle
effect:
Fighter or wizard only.
Order: Target one of your characters: If this character is a fighter, the target has POWERATTACK +10 until end of turn. If this character is a wizard, move the target forward one rank.
"Hold still human! I'll free you!" - Rockhome

name: Secrets of the Guild
effect:
Before you pay the costs for this card, spend X rogues in your army. This character has +X Levels for performing this action.
Order: Remove Secrets of the Guild from the game: This rogue permanently gains the ability "React: Once per game, after this character performs a melee strike that wounded the target: Kill the target."
"Logan, remove your mask." - Krun

name: Secrets of the Storm
effect:
Before you pay the costs for this card, spend X clerics in your army. This character has +X Levels for performing this action.
Order: Until end of turn, characters may not perform melee or ranged strikes.
The heart of Signon's plan.

name: Secrets of the Suns
effect:
Before you pay the costs for this card, spend X fighters in your army. This character has +X Levels for performing this action.
Order: Perform a +6 melee strike targeting each opposing character within two ranks.
Aroch, former brethren.

name: Secrets of the Trials
effect:
Before you pay the costs for this card, spend X wizards in your army. This character has +X Levels for performing this action.
Order: Opposing characters within four ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 19) or fall forward one rank.
Die before failing.

name: Selye
effect:
Elf
Spend Order: Shuffle an Undead Elf from your discard pile into your deck. If there is a dungeon in play, you may put that Elf on top of your deck instead.
"This place plays tricks on you. Ophinuchus is dead, along with the other Elven gods. You must have seen someone else."

name: Sestian
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Order: Twice per turn, move an adjacent Free Kingdoms character backward one rank: Sestian has +3 AC, DEFEND +5, and RIPOSTE +5 until end of turn.
"Go. Now! Trevor wants Dragon's Keep taken by nightfall."

name: Shadowblaze
effect:
Mercenary • Unique • Dragon
Shadowblaze is a rogue and wizard, enters play as though he were Level 6, and can't equip items.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Once per turn: Perform a Spend Order printed on an adjacent character as if it were printed on Shadowblaze.

name: Shield of the Meek
effect:
Shield
May remain spent during the ready phase.
Order: Spend Shield of the Meek and target a lower Level character in your army: The target has +1 HP until Shield of the Meek readies, stuns, or leaves play.

name: Shikhad
effect:
Nothrog • Barbarian
Spend Order: Target an opposing player's item: Destroy the item, or perform a number of +7 melee strikes equal to the rank the item is in, the opposing player decides.
"Welcome them, child. They are our guests." - Fo'ttr'ak'ka

name: Sister Megaria
effect:
Deverenian • Cantor
Spend Order: Target higher Level Deverenian in your army has +2 ATK, +2 AC, and +2 Skill until end of turn.
"I do not release you to death. Thou yet owest service to thy Emperor."

name: Skeletal Archer
effect:
Elf • Undead
While there is a dungeon in play, Skeletal Archer has MARKSMANSHIP +8.
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
"Fiore fears nothing so much as becoming like these creatures. Her curse would be tragic, if it wasn't so fortunate for us." - Averisk Glyn

name: Slow March
effect: Order: On each of your Orders this turn, if this character is not in the front rank, skip that Order and move this character forward one rank.
"Fools, canst thou not spy the Nothrog design? Smart, Krun... But we are smarter." - The Eternal Emperor

name: Sluagh
effect:
Nothrog • Scout
React: Before Slaugh is killed: Move one of your Siege characters forward one rank.
"Wonder if they'll bother making an even newer Goldenaxe? We could destroy that, too."

name: Sohadze
effect:
Nothrog • Scout
Order: Discard a rogue action card: Move forward or backward one rank. If the discarded card has Scout printed in its textbox, move forward or backward up to two ranks instead.
"Krun respects us. He would never send us to a needless war!"

name: Soothing Aura
effect: Spend Order: Spend X clerics in your army: Reduce to zero the next wound done to a character in your army this turn, and reduce to zero the next X wounds done to characters in your army this turn after the first.

name: Steam Ram
effect:
Nothrog • Siege
May not attack.
Spend Order: Target up to two characters within two ranks. Each must succeed with a reflex save (DC 16) or suffer a wound (Two wounds if you only targeted one character).

name: Subdue
effect:
Rogue or cleric only.
Order: Target a stunned character within one rank: If this character is a rogue, the target suffers a wound. If this character is a cleric, the target doesn't unstun during the next ready phase.
"A truce, when you are beaten. Cowards." - Fernon Wynard

name: Summon Planar
effect: Spend Order: Put this card into play in your first rank as a Level 1 Monster fighter with +3 ATK, 10 AC, +0 Skill, and 1 HP (and STEALTH +10 if the caster is a Summoner). On your next Order, skip that Order and instead the Monster gains +6 AC and +1 HP.

name: Symbiote
effect:
When you play Symbiote, choose Shield, Helm, Armor, Weapon, or Bow. Symbiote gains that trait permanently.
Symbiote gains +3 AC if it is a Shield,
+5 Skill if it is a Helm,
+1 HP if it is an Armor,
+4 ATK if it is a Weapon,
and if it is a Bow, it gives the ability "Spend Order: Perform a +7 ranged strike."
Order: Discard a card: Return Symbiote to its owner's hand.

name: Talib al-Sirr
effect:
Deverenian Warlord / Isadran
React: Once per turn, after an opposing character targets one of your Deverenians with a melee strike or action: Redirect the strike or action to another legal target.
React: After one of your Deverenians performs an action that redirected a melee strike or action, kill one of your Deverenians: Draw a card.

name: Tenanye
effect:
Elf
Order: Once per turn, remove two cards in your discard pile from the game: Search your deck for a character and put it into your discard pile.
"Hope falters, like a dying candle. The curtain rushes to end this sad, little tragedy." - Ophinuchus

name: Thayes Ainsworth
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Druid / Exile
React: Once per turn, after target Free Kingdoms character moves forward or backward: Give the target +3 ATK or +3 AC until end of turn.
"Plenty of adventures in books. At my age, I prefer the safety."

name: Tisiphone
effect:
Elf • Necromancer
Spend Order: If Tisiphone is in your first rank: Put a Level 2 or lower Undead Elf into play from your discard pile.
"The humans, the deverenians, the dwarves. We cannot risk making an enemy of Krun as well. Kill Etra."

name: Tome of Memory
effect:
SCRIBE +0
This character may SCRIBE cards in yuor discard pile as though they were in your hand.
After this character casts a spell or fails a SCRIBE check: Remove an action card in your discard pile from the game.

name: Torment
effect:
Fighter or cleric only.
React: After this character targets a melee strike: If this character is a fighter, he has +5 ATK for the strike. If this character is a cleric, the strike inflicts an additional wound.
"There is wisdom in the King's alliance, just few can see it." - Dawes

name: Tranquility
effect:
Steed
This character is Ethereal and may not equip Armor.
Order: Spend Tranquility: Move forward one rank.
"If they ask, we will guide them. That is all we can do." - Eleora

name: Traveler
effect:
Dwarf
Traveler has +3 ATK and +1 HP while there is a dungeon in play.
Traveler has +1 Level for each Charge on him.
React: Once per turn, after you defeat a dungeon: Put a Charge on Traveler.
"I need a helper for my journey."

name: Troas' Pawn
effect:
Weapon • POWERATTACK +3
This is an Instructor's Set item.
If this character has more than one Instructor's Set item, your lower Level characters have POWERATTACK +2 for each Instructor's Set item equipped to this character.

name: Undermine
effect: React: After a character pays the costs of an action: Target character has -3 ATK, AC, and Skill for the duration of the action. If this character is a Bard, instead all opposing characters have -3 ATK, AC, and Skill for the duration of the action.
"Now you tell me a tale. I'm always interested in new ones." - Ferris Bachman

name: Vaeghen
effect:
Nothrog • Astral
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
While Vaegen is in your hand, your Nothrog Barbarians have the ability "Order: Reveal Vaeghen from your hand and discard a card: Perform a +2 melee strike."

name: Vanden
effect:
Elf • Seer • SCRIBE +11
React: After Vanden performs a scribed action: Look at the top 5 cards of any deck. Return those cards to the top or bottom of that deck in any order.
"That reminds me of another excruciatingly long story..."

name: Vengeful Strike
effect:
Assassins have +1 Level for performing this action.
React: After a melee strike targeting this rogue misses by 10 or more or is a Critical Failure: Perform a number of melee strikes targeting the attacker equal to this rogue's Level.

name: Wanderetch
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Ethereal • STEALTH +3 / Meme
Order: Twice per turn: Succeed with a STEALTH check (DC 20) to spend target lower Level character within one rank.
"Two of us monsters there are, offering gifts to all from afar."

name: Will to Survive
effect: React: Before this character suffers wounds: Discard any cards in your hand and reduce the number of wounds being suffered by one.
"You're just not fast enough." - Selye

name: Xantin's Ward
effect:
Shield • RIPOSTE +3
This is an Instructor's Set item.
If this character has more than one Instructor's Set item, your lower Level characters have RIPOSTE +2 for each Instructor's Set item equipped to this character.

name: Xiathe's Touch
effect:
Bow • MARKSMANSHIP +3
This is an Instructor's Set item.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
If this character has more than one Instructor's Set item, your lower Level characters have MARKSMANSHIP +2 for each Instructor's Set item equipped to this character.

name: Xienar's Guard
effect:
Armor • DEFEND +3
This is an Instructor's Set item.
If this character has more than one Instructor's Set item, your lower Level characters have DEFEND +2 for each Instructor's Set item equipped to this character.
